definitions.definition: The process by which rocks are changed into other forms by the application of heat and/or pressure.

The process by which insects develop through life stages, for example, those of embryo , larva , pupa and imago . The life cycle of the butterfly is one of complete metamorphosis, in which the embryo grows within the egg, hatches into the larval stage caterpillar , enters the pupal stage within its chrysalis , and finally emerges as an adult butterfly imago.
Any dramatic change from one thing to another

main_definition: ( geology ) The process by which rocks are changed into other forms by the application of heat and/or pressure.
secondary_definitions: ( zoology ) The process by which insects develop through life stages, for example, those of embryo , larva , pupa and imago . The life cycle of the butterfly is one of complete metamorphosis, in which the embryo grows within the egg, hatches into the larval stage caterpillar , enters the pupal stage within its chrysalis , and finally emerges as an adult butterfly imago.
( by extension ) Any dramatic change from one thing to another
